    • Method Detail

      • damageAmount

        public static int damageAmount(int atk)
        Calculates the damage that should be done. equivalent to a die roll on FieldWorld.ATTACK_LEVEL Can never hit 0, just in case 0 triggers a divide by zero error.
        Returns:
        returns a random int of damage to be dealt

      • onTick

        public javalib.funworld.World onTick()
        Controls main BattleWorld game logic. Exits to field and rewards player if victory. Exits to MessageWorld and a new FieldWorld if player dies.
        Overrides:
        onTick in class javalib.funworld.World
        Returns:
        World

      • onKeyEvent

        public javalib.funworld.World onKeyEvent(java.lang.String s)
        Event handler for keypresses. Only returns when playerTurn is true. returns appropriate BattleWorld state based on desired player action
        Overrides:
        onKeyEvent in class javalib.funworld.World
        Parameters:

        Returns:
